data.title: Pittsburgh Penguins Playoff History
data.meta_description: Explore and research every single postseason result from all 56 seasons in franchise history, including their 5 championships.
data.text:
Overview

The Pittsburgh Penguins have played a total of 56 seasons. Their first season was in 1968, and their most recent season was in 2024.

Have the Pittsburgh Penguins gone by any other names?

No, the Pittsburgh Penguins have been known by that name since 1968.

What division do the Pittsburgh Penguins play in?

The Pittsburgh Penguins currently play in the Metropolitan Division of the Eastern Conference.

What was the best start to a Penguins season?

The two best starts to a Penguins season was the 1986-87 Pittsburgh Penguins and the 1994-95 Pittsburgh Penguins, who both started the season at 7-0. The third best start to a season was the 1975-76 Pittsburgh Penguins, who started the season with 4 wins.

What was the worst start to a Penguins season?

The worst start to a Penguins season was the 2005-06 Pittsburgh Penguins, who started the season at 0-9. The second worst starts to a Penguins season was the 1983-84 Pittsburgh Penguins and the 2001-02 Pittsburgh Penguins, who both started the season with 4 losses.

When was the last time the Penguins were in the playoffs?

The Pittsburgh Penguins last made the playoffs in 2022, when they lost the First Round. They've been in the playoffs a total of 37 times in their 56 seasons.

When was the last time the Penguins missed the playoffs?

The Pittsburgh Penguins last missed the playoffs in 2024.

When was the last time the Penguins won a playoff series?

In 2018, the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Philadelphia Flyers in the First Round.

When was the last time the Penguins lost a playoff series?

In 2022, the Pittsburgh Penguins lost to the New York Rangers in the First Round.

What years did the Penguins make the Stanley Cup Finals?

The Pittsburgh Penguins have appeared in the Stanley Cup Finals 6 times, in 1991, 1992, 2008, 2009, 2016 and 2017.

How many Stanley Cups have the Penguins won?

The Pittsburgh Penguins won the Stanley Cup Finals 5 times, in 1991, 1992, 2009, 2016 and 2017.
